Free Shipping:

All orders of ₹1499 or more of eligible items in any product category qualify.

Payment Methods:

We accept all types of Credit Card, Debit card, UPI and Wallets as a form of payment.

Returns & Refunds:

Refunds will be provided if you receive damaged or incorrect items. Any other reasons regarding returns will be handled on a case to case basis.
